error.general: An error occurred while adding a document: {{err}}
error.orderDoesNotBelong: You can't add a document to this order

deleteDocument.error: An error occurred while deleting the document: {{err}}
deleteDocument.title: Delete document
deleteDocument.noDocs: There are no documents to delete

chooseSubscription.title: Choose a subscription
chooseSubscription.description:
In order to get access to all the functionality of the site, choose a subscription and pay a subscription fee. To do this, you need to go to 
"Settings > Subscriptions"

topUpBalance.title: Top up your balance
topUpBalance.description: Your balance is zero or negative. The functionality will be limited to viewing information and navigating through sections. Please top up your balance.

addManager.title: Add a manager
addManager.description:
You need to add a manager to work with orders. To do this, you need to go to 
"Settings > Add Manager"
